oai_dc:dc.dc:title: al- Risālah al-thānīyah min rasāʼil al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Tājūrī : manuscript, [ca. 1635]
Risālah fī al-fuṣūl al-arbaʻah
Hādhihi muqaddimah mukhtaṣarah yuʻrafu minhā al-fuṣūl al-arbaʻah wa-awqāt al-ṣalāh wa-ajzāʼ al-layl wa-jihat al-qiblah bi-ghayr ālah
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tājūrī, Abū Zayd ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad , -1590
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 25 lines per page, in black and red.
MS Arab 236. Houghton Library, Harvard University.

Bound with: Taʻlīq laṭīf ʻalá al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah / li-Muḥibb al-Dīn al-Buṣrawī. 1640 (ff. 1r-14v) ; al-Khazrajīyah / li-al-Shaykh ʻAbd Allāh Ḍiyāʼ al-Dīn al-Khazrajī. 1640 (ff. 15r-18v) ; al-Risālah al-ūlá min rasāʼil al-Tājūrī fī ʻilm al-mīqāt wa-al-falak. 1635 (ff. 19r-31r) ; al-Majmūʻ fī ʻilm al-farāʼiḍ / al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻĀlim al-Rabbānī al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Kalāʼī. 1641 (ff. 39v-69r).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Meteorology--Arab countries
Seasons
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: تاجوري، أبو زيد عبد الرحمن بن محمد، , -1590
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: رسالة الثانية من رسائل العلامة الشيخ عبد الرحمن التاجوري : مخطوطة، [ca. 1635]
رسالة في الفصول الأربعة
هذه مقدمة مختصرة يعرف منها الفصول الأربعة وأوقات الصلاة وأجزاء الليل وجهة القبلة بغير آلة
